title: 旧约 - 雅歌(Song of Songs) - 第 6 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 雅歌(Song of Songs) -- 第 6 章 ( 本篇共有 8 章 )

lineList.en: Whither is thy beloved gone, O thou fairest among women? whither is thy beloved turned aside? that we may seek him with thee.
lineList.cn: 你这女子中极美丽的，你的良人往何处去了。你的良人转向何处去了，我们好与你同去寻梢他。

lineList.en: My beloved is gone down into his garden, to the beds of spices, to feed in the gardens, and to gather lilies.
lineList.cn: 我的良人下入自己园中，到香花畦，在园内牧放群羊，采百合花。

lineList.en: I am my beloved's, and my beloved is mine: he feedeth among the lilies.
lineList.cn: 我属我的良人，我的良人也属我。他在百合花中牧放群羊。

lineList.en: Thou art beautiful, O my love, as Tirzah, comely as Jerusalem, terrible as an army with banners.
lineList.cn: 我的佳偶阿，你美丽如得撒，秀美如耶路撒冷，威武如展开旌旗的军队。

lineList.en: Turn away thine eyes from me, for they have overcome me: thy hair is as a flock of goats that appear from Gilead.
lineList.cn: 求你掉转眼目不看我，因你的眼目使我惊乱。你的头发如同山羊群卧在基列山旁。

lineList.en: Thy teeth are as a flock of sheep which go up from the washing, whereof every one beareth twins, and there is not one barren among them.
lineList.cn: 你的牙齿如一群母羊，洗净上来。个个都有双生，没有一只丧掉子的。

lineList.en: As a piece of a pomegranate are thy temples within thy locks.
lineList.cn: 你的两太阳在帕子内，如同一块石榴。

lineList.en: There are threescore queens, and fourscore concubines, and virgins without number.
lineList.cn: 有六十王后八十妃嫔，并有无数的童女。

lineList.en: My dove, my undefiled is but one; she is the only one of her mother, she is the choice one of her that bare her. The daughters saw her, and blessed her; yea, the queens and the concubines, and they praised her.
lineList.cn: 我的鸽子，我的完全人，只有这一个是她母亲独生的。是生养她者所宝爱的。众女子见了，就称她有福。王后妃嫔见了，也赞美她。

lineList.en: Who is she that looketh forth as the morning, fair as the moon, clear as the sun, and terrible as an army with banners?
lineList.cn: 那向外观看，如晨光发现，美丽如月亮，皎洁如日头，威武如展开旌旗军队的是谁呢。

lineList.en: I went down into the garden of nuts to see the fruits of the valley, and to see whether the vine flourished, and the pomegranates budded.
lineList.cn: 我下入核桃园，要看谷中青绿的植物，要看葡萄发芽没有，石榴开花没有。

lineList.en: Or ever I was aware, my soul made me like the chariots of Amminadib.
lineList.cn: 不知不觉，我的心将我安置在我尊长的车中。

lineList.en: Return, return, O Shulamite; return, return, that we may look upon thee. What will ye see in the Shulamite? As it were the company of two armies.
lineList.cn: 回来，回来，书拉密女。你回来，你回来，使我们得观看你。你们为何要观看书拉密女，像观看玛哈念跳舞的呢。
